description: Provides insights into Structural worker autoscaling

targets.expr:
tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_operator_info{operator_name="${operator_name}"} 
* on(pod, namespace) group_left()
(
  sum by (pod, namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!=""})
  / 
  sum by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory"})
)

sum(max(tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_running_workers{}) by(pool_name, pool_namespace) * on(pool_name, pool_namespace) group_right()
tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_pool_info{pool_managed_by="${operator_name}"})
+
sum(max(tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_failed_workers{}) by(pool_name, pool_namespace) * on(pool_name, pool_namespace) group_right()
tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_pool_info{pool_managed_by="${operator_name}"})
+
sum(max(tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_pending_workers{}) by(pool_name, pool_namespace) * on(pool_name, pool_namespace) group_right()
tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_pool_info{pool_managed_by="${operator_name}"})

sum(
      max by (pool_name, pool_namespace) (
        tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_pool_info{pool_managed_by="${operator_name}"}
      )
    * on (pool_name, pool_namespace) group_right ()
    max by (pod, namespace, pool_name, pool_namespace) (
      label_replace(
        label_replace(tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_pool_worker_pod_info, "pod", "$1", "pod_name", "(.*)"),
        "namespace",
        "$1",
        "pod_namespace",
        "(.*)"
      ))
  * on (pod, namespace) group_right (pool_name, pool_namespace)
    sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!=""}[$__interval])) by (pod, namespace)
) by (pool_name, pool_namespace)

max by (pool_name, pool_namespace) (tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_total_pool_capacity{    pool_name="${pool_name}",  
    pool_namespace="${pool_ns}"})
-
max by (pool_name, pool_namespace) (tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_current_pool_capacity{    pool_name="${pool_name}",  
    pool_namespace="${pool_ns}"})

sum(
      max by (pool_name, pool_namespace) (
        tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_pool_info{pool_managed_by="${operator_name}"}
      )
    * on (pool_name, pool_namespace) group_right ()
    max by (pod, namespace, pool_name, pool_namespace) (
      label_replace(
        label_replace(tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_pool_worker_pod_info, "pod", "$1", "pod_name", "(.*)"),
        "namespace",
        "$1",
        "pod_namespace",
        "(.*)"
      ))
  * on (pod, namespace) group_right (pool_name, pool_namespace)
    container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!=""}
) by (pod, namespace)
/
sum (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory"}) by (pod, namespace)

sum(
      max by (pool_name, pool_namespace) (
        tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_pool_info{pool_managed_by="${operator_name}"}
      )
    * on (pool_name, pool_namespace) group_right ()
    max by (pod, namespace, pool_name, pool_namespace) (
      label_replace(
        label_replace(tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_pool_worker_pod_info, "pod", "$1", "pod_name", "(.*)"),
        "namespace",
        "$1",
        "pod_namespace",
        "(.*)"
      ))
  * on (pod, namespace) group_right (pool_name, pool_namespace)
  sum by (pod, namespace) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!=""}[$__interval]))
) by (pod, namespace)
/
  sum by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu"})

sum(
      max by (pool_name, pool_namespace) (
        tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_pool_info{pool_managed_by="${operator_name}"}
      )
    * on (pool_name, pool_namespace) group_right ()
    max by (pod, namespace, pool_name, pool_namespace) (
      label_replace(
        label_replace(tonic_ai_structural_workerpool_pool_worker_pod_info, "pod", "$1", "pod_name", "(.*)"),
        "namespace",
        "$1",
        "pod_namespace",
        "(.*)"
      ))
  * on (pod, namespace) group_right (pool_name, pool_namespace)
    sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!=""}[$__interval])) by (pod, namespace)
) by (pod)

title: Structural Worker Pool
